page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT IN SHELDON
page.content: RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES SUCH AS WHIST DRIVES,DOMINOES DRIVES AND A FEW EVENING CLASSES ARE HELD IN THE TINY VILLAGE HALL.THE YOUTH CLUB ALSO MEETS HERE AND THEY HAVE A POOL TABLE ,PLAY DARTS,HOLD DISCOS AND ENTERTAIN AT CHRISTMAS.NUMBERS AT THE YOUTH CLUB ARE NOW FALLING AS THERE ARE FEWER YOUNG CHILDREN IN THE VILLAGE.THERE IS A PLAYING FIELD WITH A SLIDE.THE CHILDREN USUALLY DRESS A FLOAT FOR THE BAKEWELL CARNIVAL.LAST YEAR THEY WERE SHELDON LEAD MINERS AND WON 2nd PRIZE. SLEDGING IS A PASTIME IN WINTER IF THERE IS ENOUGH SNOW.VEGETABLE GROWING IS POPULAR,SOME MEN GO SHOOTING.SOME CHILDREN HAVE PONIES AND MOST PEOPLE SEEM TO HAVE A DOG,SHEEP DOGS BEING THE MOST POPULAR.A MOBILE LIBARY CALLS AT THE VILLAGE EVERY FORTNIGHT.
